Iron Testament

Gameplay Programmer, Narrative Designer, Story

April 2024 - Present

Character concept by Eric Jimenez

Project Team: Rat Economy

Genre: Turn-Based Tactics Game

Engine: Unity

Version Control: Github

Coding Language: C#

Special Skills: Wwise

Iron Testament is an upcoming turn-based tactics game where you play as the last surviving member of the human race and lead a group of robot zealots in a crusade to avenge humanity.

However, revenge may not be the only path, as there are rumors of an ancient facility called Eden that may hold the secret to restoring humanity...

As a Gameplay Programmer I am responsible for:

  • Implementing ally/enemy character classes with special abilities and passives
  • Creating a saving/loading system that allows new character recruits with various abilities to persist between play sessions and stores player saves by date/time
  • Restructing our Ability scriptable objects and adding a AbilityEffects component for visual/audio feedback of special abilities
  • Using Wwise to trigger our sound effects at various gameplay moments (ex. special ability usage)

As a Narrative Designer I am responsible for:

  • Creating the character bios and outlining the general plotline
  • Writing a series of journal entries from different perspectives that flesh out the world and the factions in it
